org.cougaar.core.component
Interface ComponentView

All Known Subinterfaces:
ContainerView
public interface ComponentView

A ViewService view of a component, providing visibility into the component's ComponentDescription and advertised/obtained services.

Method Summary
 java.util.Map getAdvertisedServices()
          Get a map of all services advertised by this component via ServiceBroker.addService(java.lang.Class, org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceProvider).
 ComponentDescription getComponentDescription()
          Get the ComponentDescription, which includes the classname.
 int getId()
          Get the unique identifier of this component, which can also be used to create a component creation-order timeline.
 java.util.Map getObtainedServices()
          Get a map of obtained service classes ServiceBroker.getService(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceRevokedListener) to information about that obtained service.
 ContainerView getParentView()
          Get a view of the parent container of this component.
 long getTimestamp()
          Get the time in milliseconds when the component was loaded.
 

Method Detail

getId

int getId()
Get the unique identifier of this component, which can also be used to create a component creation-order timeline.

getTimestamp

long getTimestamp()
Get the time in milliseconds when the component was loaded.

getComponentDescription

ComponentDescription getComponentDescription()
Get the ComponentDescription, which includes the classname.

getParentView

ContainerView getParentView()
Get a view of the parent container of this component.

getAdvertisedServices

java.util.Map getAdvertisedServices()
Get a map of all services advertised by this component via ServiceBroker.addService(java.lang.Class, org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceProvider).

In the standard implementation this is an ordered LinkedHashMap by ServiceView.getId().

Returns:
a Map of Classes to ServiceViews.

getObtainedServices

java.util.Map getObtainedServices()
Get a map of obtained service classes ServiceBroker.getService(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Class, org.cougaar.core.component.ServiceRevokedListener) to information about that obtained service.

In the standard implementation this is an ordered LinkedHashMap by ServiceView.getId().

Returns:
a Map of Classes to ServiceViews.
